summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsMeet Indeed Labs G.O.A.T. Milk Toner, your new silky, milky toner that absorbs quickly, delivering a triple action of deep hydration + oil and shine control + reduced breakouts â€“ leaving your skin dewy and plump all day long.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydratingRegulates sebum productionSupports skin barrierKey IngredientsSuccinic Acid: Works synergistically with Carnitine to refine skin texture, enhance barrier function, and support a more even complexion.Carnitine: Naturally regulates sebum production in the skin to prevent excess oil production, thereby minimizing pore appearance by unclogging the skins pores. Reduces the appearance of shine on the face giving a less shiny appearance to the skin.Formulated WithoutparabensphthalatesfragranceItem 2637165How To UseAfter cleansing, apply 3-4 drops to your hands. Gently sweep over your face and neck, letting it fully absorb into your skin.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult a physician. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Succinic acid, Carnitine, C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside, C14-22 Alcohols, Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Cellulose Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Sphingomonas Ferment Extract, Citric Acid Sodium Citrate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide.California Prop65 WarningWARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals which are known to the state of California to cause cancerLearn more at www.P65Warnings.ca.gov
how_to_use: After cleansing, apply 3-4 drops to your hands. Gently sweep over your face and neck, letting it fully absorb into your skin.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult a physician. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place.
